column5: hello all got back last night from the north.had a great trip lots of fish perch herring and a pike i think.i missed him but it was a good fight.idyle tyme where we stayed was very good i would recommend this spot to anyone.our host's were great, the cabin was clean and warm.had all the things needed for a stay.sorry no pics as i forgot the camera cheers jamie
what presentation was working for ya? Im heading up that way tomorrow...
We were up bon the weekend of the 18-20 Jan, found the simplest #6 hook with splitshot up a foot was best.
minnows minnows minnows and a split shot action all day long.
thats what i figured... did you guys have a hard time finding minnows up there?
our operator had minnows and yes we got 3 walleye
Glad you had a great time & caught some fish too !!!!..cant catch all the big ones all the time right ???huh...thats why they call it fishin right....cheers
